translations: n．抢劫者，掠夺者：抢劫、掠夺他人财物的人。
· The village was attacked by a group of pillagers.
这个村庄遭到了一群抢劫者的袭击。

sentences.sentence: The longer the pillaging of the French lasted, the more complete was the destruction of the wealth of Moscow and of the forces of the pillagers.
sentences.translation: 法国人的抢劫持续的时间越久，莫斯科的财富遭受的破坏就越严重，抢劫者的力量也就损失得越多。
